Success Starts Here

Whether you're setting the foundation for a career, starting a degree that will take you to a university and beyond, or building new skills, Shoreline can help.

Getting started is easy

1

Get a Student ID

Getting your ID is your first step: it's easy, fast, and free.

Learn More

2

Find a Program

Shoreline has a wide range of programs for virtually every goal.

Learn More

3

Enroll in classes

Once you have your ID, you can start enrolling in classes.

Learn More

Explore Programs

Fields & Industries

Shoreline offers a broad range of programs across the arts, sciences, technology, business, and more.

Areas of Study

Shoreline offers degrees and certificate in over 150 areas of specialization.

University Transfer

Transfer degrees let you start your bachelor's work here, then transfer directly to a wide range of four year schools.

Professional & Technical

Shoreline's dozens of professional and technical programs offer an ideal way to begin or expand on in-demand careers.

Online Programs

Do you want to do all your classes online? We offer over 50 online programs.
